name: Blessed Weapon
description: Makes a weapon holy, doing double damage to undead or other unholy things. Doesn’t encumber.

name: Ceremonial Robes
description: +3 to  Save vs Magic when conducting Experimental Magic

name: Cold Iron Weapon
description: Makes a weapon cold iron, doing damage to the Fae. Doesn’t encumber.

name: Holy Symbol
description: A crucifix or similar. Required for a Mystic to cast spells.

name: Holy Water
description: Does d6 damage on contact to undead or other unholy things.

name: Kirlian Camera
description: Shows a faint aura around magical people, things and places photographed. Takes a day or so for images to be developed.

name: Ritual Mask
description: 3 to Save vs Magic when casting a spell not safely memorized.

name: Silver Plating
description: Makes a weapon silver. Deals double damage to certain enemies. Doesn’t encumber.

name: Tarot Deck
description: Can be used as a focus for divination spells.
